item.description:
Emotional Availability and Unavailability

Based on the book, Emotional Unavailability by Bryn Collins, Herb will explain the many defense mechanisms that keep people from being emotionally available in friendships and relationships. Herb will describe ways to move beyond defenses and have healthier relationships, as well as how to have realistic expectations in relationship.

1:00 pm - 3:30 pm

($40 - Sliding scale to $20)


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a relationship and communication coach and therapist with 30 years experience. He teaches the Enneagram, Myers Briggs and other systems to help people understand and bridge differences. He also does phone consults, teaches and coaches in organizations to help people work together effectively and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

Organize a group for your friends, family or associates.

781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
item.name: Emotional Availability and Unavailability
